indiyawe me wana wita pawathinne bharathiya janatha paksha 3 n 2k bahutharaya lath aanaduwaki.ee anuwa thamilnaduwe balapama nosalaka kriyathmaka wimata indiya madhyama aanduwata hakiya.emenma rata thula amarikanu hithawadi aanduwak pawathi.amarikawa sama witama balanne aarthika wasi saha aarakshawa pilibadawaya.me wana wita amarikawa chinaya samaga aayojana kihipayakata mula pura thibe.warthamanaye kolambaa waraya nagaraya idikirim nathara nokara pawathwagena yamata yahapalana rajayada chinayata awasthawa laba di thibe.kolambaa waraya nagaraya chinayata menma amarikawatada anagatha prayojana rasak uruma kara dena bawa amarikawa watahagena atha.amarikanu aahara sanskruthiyath itha pahasuwen waraya nagaraya thula athi kirimata amarikawata hakiya.yuropaya gila gath ayi.es.ayi.es. thrastha prahara nisa yuropiya ratawal demala saranagatha janaya desath sakayen balima swabhawikaya.mewara uthuru palathe duk ganawili fedaral yojanawata atha thaba ath puchcha ganimakata yuropa sangamaya noyama sthiraya.

"wigwam" githaya self potret albamaya samanga 1970 juni masa 8[10] wana dina eli dakwu athara ema githaya eeta pera juni ho juli masa eli dakwana ladi.[3][11][12] [1][11] mema githaya ewakata beljiyam,[13] 1972 di denmak,[14] pranshaya,[15] malayasiya,[16] nedarlanthaya,[1] singappuruwa,[17] saha switsarlanthaya,[18] yana ratawal wala janapriyama githa 10 thulata athulath wu athara kanadawa[19] saha jarmaniya[20] yana rata wala janapriyama githa 40 thulata athulath wimata samath wiya.
